UPDATE OM_BUSIORG
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
busidomain = #{busidomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
busiorgid = #{busiorgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orgname = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orglevel = #{orglevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nodetype = #{nodetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgcode = #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manapos = #{manapos,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isleaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subcount = #{subcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHERE id = #{id}
